messages.title: Straight talking. Vote UKIP
messages.content: Labour signed up to the Lisbon Treaty - giving away my freedom, and the Conservations and LibDems went along with it. If you feel as frustrated as I do, please don't stay at home on polling day - vote for a change of direction with UKIP, with an engineer, not a politician.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: No house building on green belt forced through to meet quotas imposed by Brussels.
Referenda on local and national issues.
